attributes.action: cancel the full business rates imposed on empty commercial property which is crippling our livlehood.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Due to the present financial meltdown we are unable to let our commercial offices. We have no rental income to repay our various bank loans and with the full rates due on the properties, we are facing dire problems. We are in effect paying tax on non-income.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
